<!-- Generated by Harlequin Webmaker 2.1.3; Transducer 1.0.2 --> <HTML> <HEAD> <TITLE> Concettina Guerra</TITLE> </HEAD> <BODY> <IMG SRC="images/guerra.gif"><P> <H1> Concettina Guerra</H1> <IMG SRC="goldRule.gif" width =100%> <P> <EM> Associate Professor of Computer Sciences (1984)</EM><P> <EM> Dr. Sc. Math., University of Naples, (Italy), 1972.</EM><P> Professor Guerra's research interests are in the area of computer vision, image processing and parallel computation. She is currently working on the design and implementation of efficient sequential and parallel algorithms for object representation and recognition. She is also interested in the application of techniques developed for vision tasks to problems arising in computational biology.<P> Projects: <ul> <li> <A HREF="../research/multiresor.html">Multiresolution Object Recognition</A> </ul> <P> <A HREF="http://www.cs.purdue.edu/people/guerra"> Guerra's homepage</A><P> <IMG SRC="goldRule.gif" width =100%> </BODY> </HTML> </HTML>
